ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 174
ygData.msgSnippet: Guess its what shard you are one. I ve seen a couple sold for closer to 75-100pp, and elf-hide gloves(which are great) go for around 40-60pp on Solusek Ro. Of
ygData.messageBody:
Guess its what shard you are one. I've seen a couple sold for closer to
75-100pp, and elf-hide gloves(which are great) go for around 40-60pp on
Solusek Ro. Of couse battle drums cost close to 700pp here at least, and
demon claws are rarely, if ever, sold.

Talonus DuPrey
Wandering Minstrel of Solusek Ro

"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> they are pretty rare. if you made the trip to upper guk i wouldn't expect
> anyone to have one for sale. the only time i ever heard of one for sale was
> for 500pp at an auction, which i myself would gladly pay.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 9 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Christopher Mills [mailto:xopher@...]
> > Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 8:43 PM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 174
> >
> >
> > From: Christopher Mills <xopher@...>
> >
> >
> > > ...you can get a Trollhide belt which raises your STR by 5
> > points, and the
> > > cool thing is, it is Bard/Rogue only...
> >
> > I've never seen one of these for sale. Perhaps a trip to the
> > area is in
> > order to hang around and see who has one weighing them down.
> >
> > Any idea what one might cost? I'm flat broke and overweight from some
> > recent purchases of small bronze (thank Tunare I'm a Wood Elf and can
> > wear the small stuff - the medium is going for twice as much...).
> > Would be nice to know how much cash to bring before I make
> > the long run.
> >
> > - Luvas of Fennin Ro.
> >
> > Tip o the Day: If your in your low teens, West Commons is a
> > great place
> > to hunt, both for xp and loot. Bring a magic weapon and watch out for
> > giants and griffons.
> >
